name: Block Puzzle Mania - Tangram Game
description:
Block Puzzle Mania - Tangram Game is a fun puzzle and trivia game.Help little cats to pass through different levels and get different items.You will meet different types of blocks.How far you can go?

It's a simple game, but it's really addictive.

[Game Rules]
-Drop blocks around the screen to fit them into the shaded area in the middle of the screen.
-Blocks cannot be -rotated.
-No time limited
-Less steps with high scores
-Use hits to help you step into next level


[Key Features]
- 60 stages to play
- Three difficulty levels
- Each puzzle has only one solution
- Rank up in the leaderboards, challenge your friends with game center

It is simple at first with just a few blocks and a few different possible arrangements. But as the number of blocks increase it definitely becomes challenge.

There are 60 stages for you. Every 20 stages will increase difficulty level with new blocks and unlock the new scene.
You will get different items in different scenes.
The game is very tricky. Levels seem very simple, and proving to be extremely difficulty and teaser. Block jigsaw puzzle is a cross between classic tangram and classic tetris.

Colorful blocks and a lot of working brain. If you like tangram,jigsaw puzzle or other logic game , this game is for you.


Fit it best logic game with blocks! Try it and challenge with your friends.
